DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Cardiovascular Interactions Between Mirabegron Tamsulosin
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment arm 1 ( effect mirabegron tamsulosin ) : Subjects randomize one two sequence . Subjects receive 2 single dos tamsulosin , absence mirabegron presence mirabegron . 24-hour Cardiovascular ( CV ) profile take baseline day single dose tamsulosin /combination dose sequence . Regular blood sample also take check potential Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) interaction . Treatment arm 2 ( effect tamsulosin mirabegron ) : Subjects randomize one two sequence . Subjects receive 2 single dose mirabegron , absence tamsulosin presence tamsulosin . 24-hour CV profile take baseline day single dose mirabegron/combination dose sequence . Regular blood sample also take check potential PK interaction .
